TopicTitle: Possible bug with the Mobile Processing Lab

Articles.Content:
So i had just performed a maneuver with a craft going to Jool, in my career game.

When i went back to the Space Center to check my Mobile Processing Lab, I got almost 500 science, totally normal.

But then I look at the science per day... 6.9157 SCIENCE PER DAY:confused:

I have never seen this before, and I'm not sure that this is actually a bug.

I'm running KSP v.1.0.4 on Windows 7, and I'm using steam.

I just now realized that I had a level 5 scientist in the Mobile Processing Lab.

It wasn't a bug, the Mobile Processing Lab is just crazily overpowered.

Edited September 7, 2015 by bueskyd
